title: 'Britcoin' CBDC Not Ready Yet, Says Bank of England
description: British policy makers are still undecided on a digital pound—dubbed "Britcoin"—following a central bank digital currency (CBDC) consultation.

title: Optimism-based Beam wallet to facilitate Amazon purchases through Join app
description:
Beam wallet developer Eco acquired the Join shopping app, allowing it to provide users with Amazon and Shopify payment options.

Beam wallet developer Eco has acquired the Web3 shopping app Join, according to a Jan. 25 announcement. The new acquisition will allow Beam and Join to be integrated, facilitating Amazon and Shopify purchases from Beam wallet users. Beam wallet operates on the Optimism and Base networks.

Join was founded by Dean, Awad Ayoub, and Brad Crook. It was originally backed by investor Balaji S. Srinivasan and by a grant from Base network. Eco is backed by venture capital firms Andreessen Horowitz, Coinbase Ventures, Founders Fund, Lightspeed Venture Partners and Pantera Capital.

Beam wallet is one of several new “user experience” focused wallets that attempt to eliminate seed words or native-coin gas fees. Others include Immutable Passport, which uses Google or Apple logins, and Kresus, which allows users to sign up with an email address. Worldcoin also created a wallet that pays for users' gas fees.

Read more

title: Around $39,000 Bitcoin remains above the realized price of young supply
description:
The anticipation of the first spot Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S. fueled Bitcoin to a 21-month high of $49,000. title: Is Aptos (APT) Really the Solana (SOL) Killer? Many Are Turning Their Eyes to Pullix (PLX)
description: Solana (SOL) has established itself as a prominent altcoin. However, a new wave of contenders like Aptos (APT) is considered the potential “Solana killer.”

title: Stablecoin TUSD Remains Below Intended $1 Peg as Avara’s GHO Surges to Near-Peg Heights
description: Market analysis reveals ongoing stability challenges for the stablecoin trueusd in maintaining its targeted $1 peg. title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs undergo turbulent phase Amid rising outflows
description: The cryptocurrency market, particularly the domain of spot bitcoin ETFs (Exchange-Traded Funds), has recently witnessed substantial shifts in investor sentiment and capital flow. title: Analyst: Bitcoin looks to be long-term hedge against inflation
description: The SEC's nod to Bitcoin ETFs offers a new financial avenue against the backdrop of soaring U.S. national debt.

title: Banking professionals shift to crypto sector amid growing blockchain adoption
description: The latest study by Bitget found that one-third of cryptocurrency job seekers previously held positions in the traditional banking and finance industries.
